content: and is for rnds 2-9 knit personal and non-profit use only this means you can knit for yourself for a gift or for rnds 10-14 *ktbl p1* around charity you may not sell gloves made from this pattern you may not reproduce this in the next round loosely bobble all sts in pattern pattern on or distribute it from a website this pattern may not be translated reproduced or circulated in another language downloading or printing the pattern little index finger constitutes agreement within these terms thank you and enjoy your gloves move sts from both holders to dpns justyna lorkowska toruń poland december 2012 round 1 attach yarn at the base of ring middle finger and pick up and knit 2 sts k10 12 = 12 14 sts rnds 2-9 knit rnds 10-14 *ktbl p1* around in the next round loosely bobble all sts in pattern shape thumb both gloves round 1 move 13 live sts from waste yarn or stitch holder to dpns pick up and knit 3 sts along mitt s edge = 16 sts rnds 2-9 knit rnds 10-14 *ktbl p1* around in the next round loosely bobble all sts in pattern finishing weave in all loose ends if you wish to you might block the gloves but it s not really necessary enjoy 3
